com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity

Class PickerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PermissionManagerActivity
        • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.LocationActivity
          • com.mr_apps.androidbase.activity.PickerActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBaseActivity

    public abstract class PickerActivity
extends LocationActivity
    Base activity that offers method to manage taking pictures and choosing images from gallery Warning: To avoid activity recreation remember to add "android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" in your manifest.

      • setQualityImage

        public void setQualityImage(int qualityImage)
        Sets the quality of the image taken or chosen from gallery
        Parameters:
        qualityImage - the quality of the image

      • showAlertChoice

        public void showAlertChoice(java.lang.String title,
                   boolean pickImageFromGallery,
                   boolean takePhoto)
        Shows an alert dialog that allows the user to choose an action. The possible actions are determined by the parameters of the method
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        pickImageFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking an image from gallery, false otherwise
        takePhoto - true if the dialog should contain the option for taking a photo using camera, false otherwise

      • showAlertChoice

        public void showAlertChoice(java.lang.String title,
                   boolean pickImageFromGallery,
                   boolean takePhoto,
                   boolean pickVideoFromGallery,
                   boolean recordVideo)
        Shows an alert dialog that allows the user to choose an action. The possible actions are determined by the parameters of the method
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        pickImageFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking an image from gallery, false otherwise
        takePhoto - true if the dialog should contain the option for taking a photo using camera, false otherwise
        pickVideoFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking a video from gallery, false otherwise
        recordVideo - true if the dialog should contain the option for record a video, false otherwise

      • showAlertChoice

        public void showAlertChoice(java.lang.String title,
                   boolean pickImageFromGallery,
                   boolean takePhoto,
                   boolean pickVideoFromGallery,
                   boolean recordVideo,
                   boolean pickAudioFromGallery,
                   boolean recordAudio)
        Shows an alert dialog that allows the user to choose an action. The possible actions are determined by the parameters of the method
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the dialog
        pickImageFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking an image from gallery, false otherwise
        takePhoto - true if the dialog should contain the option for taking a photo using camera, false otherwise
        pickVideoFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking a video from gallery, false otherwise
        recordVideo - true if the dialog should contain the option for record a video, false otherwise
        pickAudioFromGallery - true if the dialog should contain the option for picking an audio from gallery, false otherwise
        recordAudio - true if the dialog should contain the option for record an audio file, false otherwise

      • getDurationVideo

        public int getDurationVideo()
        Gets the duration of the video. The default value is 30, but is strongly recommended to override this method in the subclass to customize the value
        Returns:
        the default video duration, 30

      • getDurationAudio

        public int getDurationAudio()
        Gets the duration of the audio file. The default value is 120, but is strongly recommended to override this method in the subclass to customize the value
        Returns:
        the default audio file duration, 120

      • getFolder

        public java.lang.String getFolder()
        Gets the folder where the images or the video have to be saved. The default folder is the root folder, so is recommended to override this method in the subclass to customize the default folder
        Returns:
        an empty string, so the default folder is the root folder

      • getmTitle

        public java.lang.String getmTitle()
        Gets the title of the chooser dialog
        Returns:
        the title of the chooser dialog

      • setSaveInInternalStorage

        public void setSaveInInternalStorage(boolean saveInInternalStorage)
        Setter method for the "saveInInternalStorage" flag
        Parameters:
        saveInInternalStorage - true if the file should be saved in the internal storage, false otherwise

      • pickerResult

        public void pickerResult(java.lang.String path,
                FileUtils.ElementType elementType,
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Method that should be override by the subclasses to manage the image taken from camera or picked from gallery
        Parameters:
        path - the path where the image is saved
        elementType - the type of the bitmap file
        bitmap - the bitmap image
